IX.iii.1.E.6.
u
.
Date of Receipt of Income Is Not Known
Always determine the reporting period during which income is received.  If this information is not of record, initiate development.
For original and new awards, count the income from the effective date of the award if the actual date of receipt is not shown on the application.  If the beneficiary later reports the actual date of receipt of income, adjust the award.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section E - Pension - Basic Rate Determinations
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section E
